mapper.select: SELECT memKey, mFstName, mLstName, mBirthDay, gradeCD, schoolName, mEmail, eContact, ePhone, gFstName, gLstName, city, stateCD, zip, addr, gEmail, gPhone, gCellPhone, registWhy, registWhyEtc, registHow, registHowEtc, remarks, regDate, regID, updDate, updID FROM globalbiz.MemMst WHERE memKey = #{memKey}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO globalbiz.MemCommentCall (callDate, memKey, memName, callNotes, jisaCD, deptCD, regDate, regID) VALUES (#{callDate}, #{memKey}, #{memName}, #{callNotes}, #{jisaCD}, #{deptCD}, NOW(), #{regID})
mapper.select: SELECT subj FROM globalbiz.MemSubjMst WHERE memKey = #{memKey} and statusCD = '1' ORDER BY subj DESC

SELECT a.memKey, a.subj, a.studyNum, a.bookNum, b.yoil, globalbiz.FuncCodeDtlNM(b.jisaCD, '0006', b.yoil, 'E', 'Y') AS yoilName, b.visitHours, globalbiz.FuncCodeDtlNM(b.jisaCD, '0206', b.visitHours, '', 'Y') AS visitHoursName FROM globalbiz.MemSubjMst AS a INNER JOIN globalbiz.MemSubjStudy AS b ON a.memKey = b.memKey AND a.subj = b.subj WHERE a.memKey = #{memKey} AND a.statusCD = '1'
SELECT * FROM globalbiz.MemSubjStudy WHERE memKey = #{memKey} AND subj = #{subj} AND yoilSeq = 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO globalbiz.MemSubjStudyHis (memKey, subj, studyNum, bookNum, yoil, yoilSeq, bookFlag, visitHours, empKey, deptCD, jisaCD, regDate, regID, updDate, updID, hUpdCD, hRegDate, hRegID) SELECT memKey, subj, studyNum, bookNum, yoil, yoilSeq, bookFlag, visitHours, empKey, deptCD, jisaCD, regDate, regID, updDate, updID, '10', NOW(), #{workId} FROM globalbiz.MemSubjStudy WHERE memKey = #{memKey} and subj = #{subj} and yoilSeq = '1'

INSERT INTO globalbiz.MemSubjMst (memKey, subj, statusCD, memName, yoil, studyNum, bookNum, digGrade, registFstYMD, registFnlYMD, dropFnlYMD, expireYMD, feeFnlYMD, yoilChgYMD, studyNumChgYMD, bookNumChgYMD, befoYoil, befoStudyNum, befoBookNum, empKey, deptCD, jisaCD, regDate, regID, updDate, updID) SELECT memKey, subj, statusCD, memName, yoil, studyNum, bookNum, digGrade, registFstYMD, registFnlYMD, dropFnlYMD, expireYMD, feeFnlYMD, yoilChgYMD, studyNumChgYMD, bookNumChgYMD, befoYoil, befoStudyNum, befoBookNum, empKey, deptCD, jisaCD, regDate, regID, updDate, updID FROM globalbiz.MemSubjMstHis WHERE memKey = #{memKey} AND subj = #{subj} AND hUpdCD = '14' ORDER BY hRegDate DESC LIMIT 0, 1

INSERT INTO globalbiz.MemSubjDropHis (hIdx, dropYMD, memKey, subj, memName, dropReason, notes, empKey, deptCD, jisaCD, regDate, regID, hRegDate, hRegID) SELECT idx, dropYMD, memKey, subj, memName, dropReason, notes, empKey, deptCD, jisaCD, regDate, regID, NOW(), #{workId} FROM globalbiz.MemSubjDrop WHERE memKey = #{memKey} AND subj = #{subj} AND dropYMD = #{convDropDate} ORDER BY regDate DESC LIMIT 0,1
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM globalbiz.MemSubjDrop WHERE memKey = #{memKey} AND subj = #{subj} AND dropYMD = #{convDropDate} ORDER BY regDate DESC LIMIT 1
mapper.select: SELECT a.memKey, a.subj, IFNULL(b.omrDate,'') AS omrDate, IFNULL(b.jisaCD,'') AS jisaCD, c.digYN FROM globalbiz.MemSubjMst AS a LEFT JOIN ( SELECT hkey, kwamok, MAX(omrDate) AS omrDate, jisaCD FROM globaldig.OmrGicho GROUP BY hkey, kwamok ) AS b ON a.memKey = b.hkey AND a.subj = b.kwamok INNER JOIN globalbiz.DeptSubjInfo AS c ON a.jisaCD = c.jisaCD AND a.deptCD = c.deptCD AND a.subj = c.subj WHERE a.memKey = #{memKey}

SELECT idx, registYMD, memKey, subj, registGubunCD, mFstName, mLstName, mBirthDay, gradeCD, schoolName, mEmail, eContact, ePhone, gFstName, gLstName, city, stateCD, zip, addr, gEmail, gPhone, gCellPhone, registWhy, registWhyEtc, registHow, registHowEtc, remarks, fstVisitYMD, yoil, visitHours, weekNum, studyNum, bookNum, digGrade, siblingMemKey, empKey, deptCD, jisaCD, regDate, regID, updDate, updID, apmIdx FROM globalbiz.MemSubjRegist WHERE memKey = #{memKey} AND subj = #{subj} ORDER BY regDate DESC LIMIT 0,1
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM globalbiz.MemSubjMst WHERE memKey = #{memberRegist.memKey} AND subj = #{memberRegist.subj}
DELETE FROM globalbiz.MemSubjStudy WHERE memKey = #{memberRegist.memKey} AND subj = #{memberRegist.subj} AND yoilSeq = '1'
DELETE FROM globalbiz.MemSubjRegist WHERE memKey = #{memberRegist.memKey} AND subj = #{memberRegist.subj} AND registYMD = #{memberRegist.registYMD} ORDER BY regDate DESC LIMIT 1
DELETE FROM globalbiz.MemSubjTuition WHERE memKey = #{memberRegist.memKey} AND subj = #{memberRegist.subj} AND feeYMD >= #{memberRegist.registYMD}
DELETE FROM globalbiz.MemSubjProgressMst WHERE memKey = #{memberRegist.memKey} AND subj = #{memberRegist.subj}
mapper.update: UPDATE globalbiz.MemSubjMst AS a, globalbiz.MemSubjMstHis AS b SET a.memKey = b.memKey, a.subj = b.subj, a.statusCD = b.statusCD, a.memName = b.memName, a.yoil = b.yoil, a.studyNum = b.studyNum, a.bookNum = b.bookNum, a.digGrade = b.digGrade, a.registFstYMD = b.registFstYMD, a.registFnlYMD = b.registFnlYMD, a.dropFnlYMD = b.dropFnlYMD, a.expireYMD = b.expireYMD, a.feeFnlYMD = b.feeFnlYMD, a.yoilChgYMD = b.yoilChgYMD, a.studyNumChgYMD = b.studyNumChgYMD, a.bookNumChgYMD = b.bookNumChgYMD, a.befoYoil = b.befoYoil, a.befoStudyNum = b.befoStudyNum, a.befoBookNum = b.befoBookNum, a.empKey = b.empKey, a.deptCD = b.deptCD, a.jisaCD = b.jisaCD, a.regDate = b.regDate, a.regID = b.regID, a.updDate = b.updDate, a.updID = b.updID WHERE a.memKey = b.memKey AND a.subj = b.subj AND b.memKey = #{memberRegist.memKey} AND b.subj = #{memberRegist.subj} AND b.hUpdCD = '13' AND DATE_FORMAT(b.hRegDate,'%Y-%m-%d') = #{memberRegist.registYMD} AND b.statusCD != '1'

UPDATE globalbiz.MemSubjStudy AS a, globalbiz.MemSubjStudyHis AS b SET a.memKey = b.memKey, a.subj = b.subj, a.studyNum = b.studyNum, a.bookNum = b.bookNum, a.yoil = b.yoil, a.yoilSeq = b.yoilSeq, a.bookFlag = b.bookFlag, a.visitHours = b.visitHours, a.empKey = b.empKey, a.deptCD = b.deptCD, a.jisaCD = b.jisaCD, a.regDate = b.regDate, a.regID = b.regID, a.updDate = b.updDate, a.updID = b.updID WHERE a.memKey = b.memKey AND a.subj = b.subj AND a.yoilSeq = '1' AND b.memKey = #{memberRegist.memKey} AND b.subj = #{memberRegist.subj} AND b.hUpdCD = '13' AND DATE_FORMAT(b.hRegDate,'%Y-%m-%d') = #{memberRegist.registYMD}
mapper.select: SELECT MIN(a.hkey) AS hkey, a.mFstName, a.mLstName, a.skey, a.sname, a.omrHak, globalbiz.FuncCodeDtlNM(a.jisaCD, '0003', a.omrHak, '', 'Y') AS omrHakName, omrBirth, a.schoolName, a.mEmail, a.eContact, a.ePhone, a.gFstName, a.gLstName, a.city, a.stateCD, b.stateName, a.zip, a.addr, a.gEmail, a.gPhone, a.gCellPhone, a.deptCD, a.jisaCD, a.deptName, a.registWhy, a.registWhyEtc, a.registHow, a.registHowEtc, a.memKey, a.aidx, a.regDate, a.regID FROM globaldig.FreeGicho AS a LEFT JOIN globalbiz.StateInfo AS b ON a.jisaCD = b.jisaCD AND a.stateCD = b.stateCD WHERE a.gFstName = (SELECT gFstName FROM globaldig.FreeGicho WHERE hkey = #{hkey}) AND a.gLstName = (SELECT gLstName FROM globaldig.FreeGicho WHERE hkey = #{hkey}) GROUP BY a.mFstName, a.mLstName, a.omrBirth ORDER BY a.hkey

SELECT a.hkey, a.kwamok, MAX(a.omrDate) AS omrDate, a.jisaCD, b.digYN, a.aidx, a.memKey FROM globaldig.FreeGicho AS a LEFT JOIN globalbiz.DeptSubjInfo AS b ON a.jisaCD = b.jisaCD AND a.deptCD = b.deptCD AND a.kwamok = b.subj WHERE a.aidx = #{aidx} OR a.memKey = CASE WHEN a.memKey != '' THEN (SELECT MAX(memKey) AS memKey FROM globaldig.FreeGicho WHERE aidx = #{aidx} GROUP BY aidx) ELSE '0' END GROUP BY kwamok

SELECT MAX(a.hkey) as hkey, a.kwamok, MAX(a.omrDate) AS omrDate, a.jisaCD, b.digYN, a.aidx, a.memKey FROM globaldig.FreeGicho AS a INNER JOIN globalbiz.DeptSubjInfo AS b ON a.jisaCD = b.jisaCD AND a.deptCD = b.deptCD AND a.kwamok = b.subj WHERE a.memKey = #{memKey} GROUP BY a.memKey, a.kwamok

SELECT a.subj FROM globalbiz.DeptSubjInfo AS a LEFT JOIN globaldig.FreeGicho AS c ON a.subj = c.kwamok AND c.aidx = #{key} WHERE a.jisaCD = '08' AND a.deptCD = '00022' AND a.digYN = 'Y' AND c.hkey IS NULL ORDER BY sortCD
